Articles.Content:
I have a challenge build for all you builders out there. Its the Polar Pod. A scientific laboratory boat typed thing designed for studying Antarctica and the waters around there. Its just a idea at the moment. To do this build would involve a boat mod or similar mod that has floats and stuff. I know there is a boat parts mod by InfiniteDice but I think it is outdated . Anyways here some pictures of it (none of them belong to me):

http://fr.cdn.v5.futura-sciences.com/builds/images/thumbs/1/1b50cfa35e_Vue_en_coupe_dans_les_vague.jpg

http://i.f1g.fr/media/ext/805x453_crop/www.lefigaro.fr/medias/2014/12/11/PHOf8bb9eea-8150-11e4-8865-1d692c0c3a2f-805x453.jpg

http://visualoop.com/media/2013/12/PolarPod.jpg

Its the same idea as the Flip Ship. It uses ballast to keep it straight up in the water. Its a huge thing if you haven't noticed (insert wiener joke here). But a shorter version of the ballast thing at the bottom would most likely work for KSP. I think this would be a cool build and challenge for the people who are great builders in KSP. I would attempt it but I am not the best at building stuff like this.

Good luck to anyone who accepts my challenge.
